title: Culture is Key to Attracting and Keeping Talent
itunes:title: Culture is Key to Attracting and Keeping Talent
description:
Melissa Daimler, Chief Learning Officer at Udemy, discusses her book ReCulturing: Design Your Company Culture to Connect with Strategy and Purpose for Lasting Success.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
